name: Volcano
description: An active volcano provides valuable minerals and geothermal energy, but the constant threat of eruption makes it extremely dangerous. The fertile soil supports unique ecosystems, while toxic gases and lava flows create deadly hazards.
atmosphere: Acrid sulfur scent and metallic volcanic gases. Warm ground beneath feet. Distant rumblings create unease. Steam rises from earth vents creating otherworldly landscape. Rich, dark soil supports vibrant life. Constant eruption threat hangs like palpable tension.
